function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Aerosol transmission of SARS-CoV-2 through HVAC system","Impact":"Increased risk of infection for individuals in the built environment","Mitigation":"Improving HVAC filtration systems, increasing ventilation rates, and ensuring proper air circulation","Technologies":"Advanced HVAC filtration systems, air purifiers, ventilation control systems","People":"Individuals in indoor spaces, especially those with poor ventilation","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, HVAC engineers"},{"Description":"Short-range aerosol transmission due to low ventilation rate","Impact":"Higher likelihood of SARS-CoV-2 transmission within close proximity","Mitigation":"Increasing ventilation rates, using air purifiers, and promoting outdoor air circulation","Technologies":"Air purifiers, ventilation control systems, outdoor air quality sensors","People":"Individuals in close proximity to infected individuals","Owner":"Facility managers, building owners, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Potential for contamination and spread in indoor dining settings","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission among diners in close proximity","Mitigation":"Implementing physical distancing measures, improving ventilation, and using air purifiers","Technologies":"Outdoor air quality sensors, air purifiers, ventilation control systems","People":"Diners in indoor restaurant settings","Owner":"Restaurant managers, public health authorities"}]}
